name: Obstacle One (Mini Legend Games)
description:
Obstacle One is a space game inspired from the arcade game "River Raid". 

Tilt and steer to dodge asteroids to keep your squadron alive through the levels.

I made this with a group for Uni, we named our project studio Phat Panda. I was the group leader and did the games programming and the majority of the level setup and design. My group members were tasked with asset design, 3d modelling, sound design, and game production.

Dodge Asteroids!

Tilt and Steer!

Pick  Up Speed Boosts!

Keep Your Squad Alive!
